name: FL-Activations
description: Past and future Foxtrot Lima activations

scripts.build:sass: node-sass src/_includes/sass -o src/_includes/css && npm run prefix
scripts.dev: ELEVENTY_ENV='dev' npx eleventy --serve && npm run sass
scripts.prod: npm run build:sass && npm run build:images && ELEVENTY_ENV='prod' npx eleventy --serve && npm run prefix
scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:images && ELEVENTY_ENV='prod' npx eleventy && npm run prefix

author: 56FL001, Timo
